IAccountDAO
Interface for Data Access Object (DAO) to manage Account entities.
IGalleryDAO
The IGalleryDAO interface provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Gallery objects.
ILocationDAO
The ILocationDAO interface provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Location objects.
IndividualPhoto
 
IPersonDAO
The IPersonDAO interface provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Person objects.
IPhotoDAO
The IPhotoDAO interface provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Photo objects.
ITagDAO
The ITagDAO interface provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Tag objects.
Location
The Location class represents a location with an ID and a name.
MockAccountDAO
Mock implementation of the IAccountDAO interface for testing purposes.
MockGalleryDAO
The MockGalleryDAO class is a mock implementation of the IGalleryDAO interface.
MockLocationDAO
The MockLocationDAO class provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Location objects using an in-memory list.
MockPersonDAO
The MockPersonDAO class provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Person objects using an in-memory list.
MockPhotoDAO
The MockPhotoDAO class provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Photo objects using an in-memory list.
MockTagDAO
The MockTagDAO class provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Tag objects using an in-memory list.
Password
The Password class provides methods for generating and verifying hashed passwords.
Person
The Person class represents a person with an ID, first name, and last name.
Photo
The Photo class represents a photo with an ID, date, description, tags, location, and image data.
SqliteAccountDAO
The SqliteAccountDAO class implements the IAccountDAO interface and provides methods to interact with the SQLite database for account-related operations.
SqliteConnection
A singleton class that facilitates a connection with the accounts SQL server.
SqliteDate
The SqliteDate class provides methods for converting between Date objects and SQLite date strings.
SqliteLocationDAO
The SqliteLocationDAO class provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Location objects using an SQLite database.
SqlitePersonDAO
The SqlitePersonDAO class implements the IPersonDAO interface and provides methods to interact with the SQLite database for person-related operations.
SqlitePhotoDAO
The SqlitePhotoDAO class provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Photo objects using a SQLite database.
SqliteTagDAO
The SqliteTagDAO class provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Tag objects using a SQLite database.
StageManager
The StageManager class provides methods for managing the primary stage and switching scenes in a JavaFX application.
Tag
The Tag class represents a tag associated with a photo, including the ID, photo ID, person, and coordinates.
